name: jshier/CocoaHeadsBluetooth
description: An app to demonstrate some of the capabilities of the CoreBluetooth framework on iOS.

files.README.md:
# CocoaHeadsBluetooth
An app to demonstrate some of the capabilities of the CoreBluetooth framework on iOS. It must run on a real device, so you must provide your own provisioning profile and signing identity. Requires Xcode 7.1.

name: jshier/Dragonfly
description: A Swift MQTT client using Network.framework.

files.README.md:
# Dragonfly
A Swift MQTT client using Network.framework.

# SwiftyNotificationCenter
